001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2;
003
004import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
006
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.InternalLogger;
009import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.Utils;
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
011
012public abstract class BaseAuthTokenSupplier extends AutoCloseableService implements TokenSupplier {
013    protected final VrapHttpClient vrapHttpClient;
014    protected final ApiHttpRequest apiHttpRequest;
015    protected final InternalLogger logger = InternalLogger.getLogger(LOGGER_AUTH);
016
017    public BaseAuthTokenSupplier(final VrapHttpClient vrapHttpClient, ApiHttpRequest apiHttpRequest) {
018        this.vrapHttpClient = vrapHttpClient;
019        this.apiHttpRequest = apiHttpRequest;
020    }
021
022    @Override
023    public CompletableFuture<AuthenticationToken> getToken() {
024        return vrapHttpClient.execute(apiHttpRequest).whenComplete((response, throwable) -> {
025            logger.info(() -> String.format("%s %s %s", apiHttpRequest.getMethod().name(), apiHttpRequest.getUri(),
026                response.getStatusCode()));
027            if (throwable != null) {
028                logger.error(() -> response, throwable);
029            }
030            else {
031                logger.debug(() -> response);
032            }
033        }).thenApply(apiHttpResponse -> {
034            if (apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode() < 200 || apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode() > 299) {
035                if (apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode() == 405) {
036                    throw new CompletionException(new AuthException(apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode(),
037                        new String(apiHttpResponse.getBody()), apiHttpRequest.getHeaders(),
038                        apiHttpResponse.getMessage()
039                                + " : auth token URI may be incorrect e.g. https://auth.europe-west1.gcp.commercetools.com/oauth/token",
040                        apiHttpResponse));
041                }
042                throw new CompletionException(
043                    new AuthException(apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode(), new String(apiHttpResponse.getBody()),
044                        apiHttpRequest.getHeaders(), apiHttpResponse.getMessage(), apiHttpResponse));
045            }
046            return apiHttpResponse;
047        })
048                .thenApply(Utils.wrapToCompletionException((ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) -> JsonUtils
049                        .fromJsonByteArray(response.getBody(), AuthenticationToken.class)));
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    protected void internalClose() {
054        if (vrapHttpClient instanceof AutoCloseable)
055            closeQuietly((AutoCloseable) vrapHttpClient);
056    }
057}
